mapper.sql: id, purchase_code, user_code, salesman_code, cust_code, purchase_project, purchase_date, purchase_order_code, currency, exchange_rate, delivery_order_code, cust_order_code, delivery_address, invoice_code, bill_type, total_sum, discount_amount, receivable_accoun, received_amoun, receipt_num, collection_terms, account_period, due_date, is_enable, remarks, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user
mapper.select: SELECT PINFO.purchase_code AS purchaseCode, PINFO.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, SUPPLIER.cust_name AS supplierName, PINFO.currency AS currency, PINFO.exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, PINFO.total_sum AS totalSum, PINFO.discount_amount AS discountAmount, PINFO.receivable_accoun AS receivableAccoun, PINFO.due_date AS dueDate, PINFO.payment_status AS paymentStatus, PINFO.invoice_code AS invoiceCode, UINFO.user_name AS purchaseName, PINFO.create_user AS createUser, PINFO.remarks AS remarks FROM tab_purchase_info PINFO LEFT JOIN tab_customer_supplier SUPPLIER ON SUPPLIER.cust_type=3 AND SUPPLIER.cust_code=PINFO.cust_code LEFT JOIN tab_user_info UINFO ON UINFO.user_code=PINFO.user_code /*WHERE*/

SELECT id, purchase_code , user_code , salesman_code A, cust_code , purchase_project , purchase_date , exchange_rate , purchase_order_code , currency AS currency, delivery_order_code , cust_order_code , delivery_address , invoice_code , bill_type , total_sum , discount_amount , receivable_accoun , received_amoun , receipt_num , collection_terms , account_period , due_date , is_enable , remarks , create_user , create_time FROM tab_purchase_info PINFO WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_purchase_info (id, purchase_code, user_code, salesman_code, cust_code, purchase_project, purchase_date, purchase_order_code, currency, exchange_rate, delivery_order_code, cust_order_code, delivery_address, invoice_code, bill_type, total_sum, discount_amount, receivable_accoun, received_amoun, receipt_num, collection_terms, account_period, due_date, is_enable, remarks, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{purchaseOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deliveryOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receivableAccoun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receivedAmoun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receiptNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionTerms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
